articles.author: Clare Watson
articles.title: A Forgotten Continent From 40 Million Years Ago May Have Just Been Rediscovered - ScienceAlert
articles.description: A low-lying continent that existed some 40 million years ago and was home to exotic fauna may have "paved the way" for Asian mammals to colonize southern Europe, new research suggests.
articles.content:
A low-lying continent that existed some 40 million years ago and was home to exotic fauna may have "paved the way" for Asian mammals to colonize southern Europe, new research suggests.

articles.title: Stocks skid, oil pops as Ukraine crisis deepens - Reuters
articles.description: Global stocks tumbled while safe-havens rallied and oil surged on Tuesday as Europe's eastern flank stood on the brink of war after Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered troops into breakaway regions of eastern Ukraine.

articles.title: Early Galaxy S22 Ultra adopters have already run into an annoying display bug - PhoneArena
articles.description: Some Galaxy S22 Ultra units shipped across Europe are exhibiting a nasty display behavior, but Samsung might be able to fix the issue with a future update.

articles.title: ESA's Solar Orbiter captures a huge eruption from the Sun - Daily Mail
articles.description: The burst of radiation erupted from the side of the Sun facing away from Earth and extended millions of miles into space, the European Space Agency said.
articles.content:
A huge eruption from the sun has been caught on camera by the European Space Agency's (ESA) Solar Orbiter probe.
